TextBlock.Text: PHYLA: We have no classification for this object. It resists analysis. Mass fluctuates. Field containment is holding for now.
ASTERA: I’ve designated it as "The Box". Anything placed inside becomes inaccessible. Even light does not return.
ZOSTE: The stasis field is controlled manually from the upper platform. I urge caution. We do not fully understand what this thing does.
CARYO: If this ever destabilizes... the consequences might extend beyond this station.
